quick_start.title: New console app
quick_start.code:
dotnet new console -lang F# -n Hello && cd Hello
dotnet run

tasks.title: Read file
tasks.code:
open System.IO
[<EntryPoint>] let main _ = let s = File.ReadAllText("README.md"); printfn "%s" (s.Substring(0, min 200 s.Length)); 0

tasks.title: GET JSON
tasks.code:
open System; open System.Net.Http; open System.Threading.Tasks
[<EntryPoint>] let main _ = task { use c = new HttpClient(); let! s = c.GetStringAsync("https://httpbin.org/json"); printfn "%s" s }.GetAwaiter().GetResult(); 0
